name: What Would You Do? Library Management in the Time of Coronavirus
name_original: What Would You Do? Library Management in the Time of Coronavirus
description:
This short game leads you through a short choose-your-own-adventure style story about being a library manager in March 2020 when COVID-19 has begun to spread to the United States. Integrating management theory and practical experience, it guides the reader through challenging decisions that must be made in service to and for the safety of the public. 

This game was created as a final project for IS 410 - Management Theory and Practice at UCLA in Spring 2020. 

[Cover image is an illustration from "The Prayer Book of Bonne Luxembourg, Duchess of Normandy", attributed to Jean Le Noir]
